prompts.title: Prompt #0
prompts.description: ChatGPT makes tough science ideas easy to understand, giving either basic overviews or details explanations
prompts.template: Elaborate on the principles of .............................. computing and its potential in ........................... and .........................
prompts.example: Elaborate on the principles of quantum computing and its potential in cryptography and optimization problems.
